name: Jeremy Gale
tagline: Dad. CTO. Foodie. Hockey (Flames) fan. App developer. Human being.
body:
### About Me
I'm a geek from Calgary, Alberta, Canada. I'm a father to one boy (soon to be two), which has [ruined everything in the nicest way](http://www.jonathancoulton.com/wiki/You_Ruined_Everything/Lyrics). I love technology, [but not as much as you, you see](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ERCzN91JicA). I used to work at Google in the Bay Area, and have the distinction of being the first person I ever heard of to quit from Google (I moved back home for love). I'm really into hockey, especially fantasy hockey and the Flames. I'd probably beat you in a hockey pool (Sorry, not sorry). I'm also really into restaurants, or at least I used to be before having kids. I made iOS [app versions](http://www.forcegrind.com/calgaryeats/) of Calgary restaurant critic John Gilchrist's books, and an app called [Eat Canada](http://www.forcegrind.com/calgaryeats/) for business travellers.

### Links
* [Resume](https://jeremygale.com/resume/) - See what I've done with my life.
* [Force Grind](http://www.forcegrind.com) - My consulting company for custom iOS development.
* [GitHub](https://github.com/jgale) - I haven't contributed as much to open-source as I should. Sorry.
* [Twitter](https://twitter.com/jeremygale) - Imagine a Venn diagram of Flames Hockey, Technology, and quirky-joke retweets. Are you in the intersection of those 3? If you, you and the 4 other people like you will love my Twitter account!
* [Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/jeremygale) - FACT: My kids are the cutest kids in the whole world. Their grandmother told me so.
* [mailto:jeremy@jeremygale.com](Email Me).
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
